column5: I'm coming up to LOTW for a week in mid-August. We are staying at Cyrus Resort, on the U.S. side, just north of Baudette, MN. I need some suggesttions as to where to fish, for both northerns and walleyes. I have gps, so if you have any specific places, islands etc that I should try, let me know. If you have gps coordinates, that would be great. I plan to fish both the US and Canadian side.
